Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Sudden Shift]{Sudden Shift}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Trickster's Twin]{Trickster's Twin}

You deceive others and cause mischief.
name: Trickery Domain
